mapper.select: select dr.component_id componentId, c.name component, dr.bridge_id positionId, b.stake_or_truss_number position, dr.disease_id diseaseId, d.name disease from soms.t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN soms.t_component c on dr.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN soms.t_component cc on cc.id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN soms.t_bridge b on dr.bridge_id = b.id LEFT JOIN soms.t_disease d on dr.disease_id = d.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId}) GROUP BY component_id,bridge_id,disease_id

select dr.disease_attribute_id diseaseAttributeId, da.value diseaseAttributeName, dr.content, dr.type from soms.t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN soms.t_disease_attribute da on dr.disease_attribute_id = da.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_id,dr.disease_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId},#{positionId},#{diseaseId}) and dr.type = 1
